title: Bug 50129ContextConfig  unnecessary null checks
description: Bug 50129ContextConfigunnecessary null checks Created attachment 26192 [details]Patch to remove null checksSample code:urlPatterns = processAnnotationsStringArray(evp.getValue());urlPatternsSet = urlPatterns != null && urlPatterns.length0;for (String urlPattern : urlPatterns) {The check "urlPatterns != null" is unnecessary as the method call never returns null.If it could return null, then the for loop would cause an NPE.
